name: propitious
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
likely to result in success, or showing signs of success: With the economy in recession, it was not a propitious time to start a company.

likely to result in success, or showing signs of success: With economic conditions so uncertain, he felt it was not a propitious time to make a big investment.
